attributes.action: Make Compusuarly Spray Suppression systems on Vechicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Bad Weather of which we get our fair share the roads naturally get lots of surface water with a small amount of outlay the Spray could be cut right down and we could all see where we are going a lot better.
Even if at least a set of good quality Mud Flaps were fitted to even just the Rear of the Vechicle then we would not have so many Broken and Chipped Windscreens the stones are propelled at some 100 M P H from the Tyre Tread before smashing into your Vechicle
Prevent this Simples !
